# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of the changes made.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Test improvements

## Related Issues
Fixes #(issue number)
Closes #(issue number)
Relates to #(issue number)

- Change 1
- Change 2
- Change 3

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] Widget tests added/updated
- [ ] Golden tests added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing performed
- [ ] Accessibility testing performed
- [ ] Performance testing performed

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Code Quality
- [ ] Code is properly formatted (`flutter format .`)
- [ ] Code analysis passes (`flutter analyze`)
- [ ] No new linting warnings
- [ ] Code coverage maintained or improved
- [ ] Performance impact considered

## Security
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Authentication/authorization properly implemented
- [ ] Input validation added where necessary
- [ ] Error handling doesn't leak sensitive information

## Accessibility
- [ ] Proper semantic labels added
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Screen reader compatibility verified
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG guidelines
- [ ] Focus management implemented

## Performance
- [ ] No performance regressions
- [ ] Memory usage considered
- [ ] Battery usage impact minimal
- [ ] Network usage optimized
- [ ] Caching strategy implemented where appropriate

## Breaking Changes
If this is a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration path:
- Impact: [describe impact]
- Migration: [describe migration steps]

## Deployment Notes
Any special deployment considerations:
- [ ] Database migrations required
- [ ] Environment variables added/changed
- [ ] Third-party service configuration changes
- [ ] Feature flags needed

## Rollback Plan
If something goes wrong, how can this be rolled back?
- [ ] Simple revert of this PR
- [ ] Requires additional steps: [describe steps]
- [ ] Cannot be easily rolled back: [explain why]

## Reviewer Checklist
For reviewers to check:
- [ ] Code is readable and maintainable
- [ ] Tests are comprehensive and meaningful
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] Performance implications are acceptable
- [ ] Security considerations are addressed
- [ ] Accessibility requirements are met
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate
- [ ] Code follows project conventions
